original_title: American Steam: Vol. 1: Steam in the 50s & 60s
overview: Originally 16mm negative film from the collection of Tom A. Strid. You will see Union Pacific Big Boys, Duluth, Missabe & Iron Range articulates & Northeastern as well as some more steam in other parts of the country. From 4-8-8-4 to 2-8-0's.
title: American Steam: Vol. 1: Steam in the 50s & 60s
